channel.title: Runescape 2003 - 2006 Forums
channel.description:
Hello all, Im working on re-creating the old forums. Im currently looking for screenshots of the forum homepage, or a download perhaps of the 2003 - 2006 forums. I have all of the new 2007 forum icons now, so I dont need these ( unless its the runescape classic section). Im wondering if anyone has the old forum icons cached on their computers? If anyone could , may you please view the image list I have below & search for them on your computers just incase they got cached?
Here's the compiled list of the old forum icons to search for on your computer:
Announce.gif Armor.gif Clansdiscussion.gif Clansrecruitment.gif Cluescrolls.gif Complements.gif Crafting.gif Discontinueditems.gif Duelling.gif Events.gif Farming.gif Fletching.gif Food.gif Forumfeedback.gif Futureupdates.gif General.gif Goals&Achievements.gif Herblore.gif Itemdiscussion.gif Locations.gif Miscellaneous.gif Monsters.gif News&announcements.gif Offtopic.gif Oresandbars.gif Pking.gif Poweredby.gif Quests.gif Rants.gif Recentupdates.gif Refresh.gif Roleplaying.gif Rscclans.gif Rscgeneral.gif Rscmarketplace.gif Rscpking.gif Rscrants.gif Runes.gif Skills.gif Stories.gif Suggestions.gif Techsupport.gif Treasuretrailitems.gif Weapons.gif
Any help would be much appriciated! Thanks so much! - Mopar Fan ^_^

item.title: Runescape 2003 - 2006 Forums
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

[quote=“Mezzyscape562, post:8, topic:552462”]http://www.rune-server.org/programming/website-development/downloads/442699-v1-5-free-rcs-runescape-community-script-old-runescape-website-remake.html

Here, all the forum files.[/quote]

Thanks but I have found that before. It has the late 2006 - 2008 forum icons, but I need the 2004 - 2005 forum icons.

[quote=“Newty, post:4, topic:552462”]https://www.dropbox.com/s/1evfi4sjkiodbfx/RuneScape_website.rar?dl=0

Sadly I couldn’t find the exact icons you were looking for but I think that the DL I just gave you has some pretty cool stuff in it that you’ll have trouble finding anywhere else.[/quote]

Thanks, it is pretty cool. I found it last year sometime before. I think S_Or_S released it on rune-server? Thanks again though

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:9, topic:552462”]That link shows 2006-2008.

Here is a archive us RSCers use : http://www.rscdump.com/
Download “eXemplars collection” - yes it’s quite a large download but has some files from the good ol days. Might be worth a download.[/quote]

I found a picture of the pmod forums as they were in 2005 in there! Thanks mate, I’ve attached the picture for others to see. With that picture I have one more icon ( total of 9 now ) of original forum icons, plus now the pmod forums.

Did you see my rsc website release on the rsc section before? It’s a release of everything I could find on the webs & archive.org. Thought you might think it’d be interesting since you mentioned rsc. Some pages you have to have javascript disabled in order to view it. https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=667396.0

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape 2003 - 2006 Forums
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

That link shows 2006-2008.

Here is a archive us RSCers use : http://www.rscdump.com/
Download “eXemplars collection” - yes it’s quite a large download but has some files from the good ol days. Might be worth a download.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape 2003 - 2006 Forums
item.dc:creator: @Mezzyscape562 Mezzyscape562
item.description:
@Mezzyscape562 wrote:

rune-server.ee

[v1.5][FREE] RCS - RuneScape Community Script (old RuneScape website remake)

Rune-Server

Here, all the forum files.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape 2003 - 2006 Forums
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

I’m fairly positive that someone made a replica website which included the forums, man my memory is kicking in… it was abandoned due to sql injections but contained everything he is requesting. Hopefully it is still on here.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape 2003 - 2006 Forums
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

tyb97:

Most of the releases on this website have been for the webpage itself, only a few have correctly replicated the forums and those tend not to release it fully open-source.

We replicated the forums but that was from more 2006 era ish, they could easily be adapted though.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Dropbox

RuneScape_website.rar

Shared with Dropbox

Sadly I couldn’t find the exact icons you were looking for but I think that the DL I just gave you has some pretty cool stuff in it that you’ll have trouble finding anywhere else.

item.title: Runescape 2003 - 2006 Forums
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

Search the old forum projects that are around here, they have all the stuff you mentioned.

Thanks for your reply. I searched moparscape and google, and all I could find was the runescape community script. I found all of the new forum icons, but not of 2004/2005’s forums which Im currently looking for. Ive attached a picture to show my progress so far.

If you could find one of the old forum projects you mentioned that might have the 2005 forum icons, thatd be great & much appreciated. I couldnt find any of the projects on moparscape, or if I googled ‘moparscape runescape forums’ to find threads on moparscape.

Read full topic
